item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JXAGN5RQ9PFC3TE10DY7T14H
item.description: While installing Windows 10 LTSC, was going through the list of my must-have apps. One of those is WordWeb for a time now. Now I’m wondering if there’s still have a need for that. ChatGPT can help me better with word definitions, synonyms and antonyms.
item.content:encoded: While installing Windows 10 LTSC, was going through the list of my must-have apps. One of those is WordWeb for a time now. Now I’m wondering if there’s still have a need for that. ChatGPT can help me better with word definitions, synonyms and antonyms.

item.title: Deploying pyKMS Using Docker-compose: Activate Windows 11
item.description:
Deploying pyKMS Using Docker-compose: Activate Windows 11

Learn how to deploy pyKMS using Docker-compose, activate a Windows 11 computer, and manage Microsoft Office activations with this cost-free alternative to Microsoft’s KMS servers.
item.content:encoded:
Deploying pyKMS Using Docker-compose: Activate Windows 11

Learn how to deploy pyKMS using Docker-compose, activate a Windows 11 computer, and manage Microsoft Office activations with this cost-free alternative to Microsoft’s KMS servers.

item.title: MassGrave
item.description:
MassGrave

Open-source Windows and Office activator featuring HWID, Ohook, TSforge, KMS38, and Online KMS activation methods, along with advanced troubleshooting.
item.content:encoded:
MassGrave

Open-source Windows and Office activator featuring HWID, Ohook, TSforge, KMS38, and Online KMS activation methods, along with advanced troubleshooting.

item.title: Make Your Own Streaming TV Channel with Plex and ErsatzTV
item.description:
Make Your Own Streaming TV Channel with Plex and ErsatzTV

ErsatzTV is an open source project that lets you schedule your own streaming live TV channel! Build out time slots, schedule programming, and recreate the TV experience of your youth.
item.content:encoded:
Make Your Own Streaming TV Channel with Plex and ErsatzTV

ErsatzTV is an open source project that lets you schedule your own streaming live TV channel! Build out time slots, schedule programming, and recreate the TV experience of your youth.
